content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As a private landlord looking to maximize my return on investment, I'm confident this exceptional apartment in the bustling city center of München offers significant value. However, to proceed with discussing a rental price, let's first engage in skillful negotiation, keeping our focus solely on this aspect. When we reach an agreed figure that satisfies us both, I'll respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If we reach an impasse, I will communicate my reasons for terminating the negotiation. But rest assured, I'm determined to secure the highest price possible for this sought-after property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello, Yi-Nuo. I appreciate your straightforward approach to this negotiation. Considering the quality of the apartment and its prime location, I believe a price of 1,400 euros per month would be fair.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my initial expectation for this highly sought-after apartment is significantly higher, taking into account my stance as a greedy landlord. However, if you could adjust your offer slightly, we may find common ground to proceed.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Yi-Nuo. As a landlord, I must ensure the property's value is reflected in the rental price. Given your previous response, I'll make my offer 1,300 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While I appreciate your attempt to meet halfway, my primary objective remains obtaining the maximum rental price possible. Unfortunately, this revised offer still falls short of my expectations. I'll have to decline and push for a higher sum. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
